strapiPost.title: Masquerade For Domestic Violence Awareness
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by Junior League of Northwest Arkansas
strapiPost.content:
Get ready for an evening that is sure to be unforgettable with the Junior League of Northwest Arkansas (JLNWA). 

  • For a cause: Don your masks as the JLNWA is hosting its 10th annual Moonlight Masquerade at Record in downtown Bentonville. The proceeds will go towards bringing awareness and prevention of domestic violence in NWA. 
  • Contribute: The masquerade starts at 7p on Friday, Jan. 28th. Tickets, tables and promenade packages are available to purchase, all of which include dinner and drinks. Businesses also have the opportunity to donate to a silent auction and be featured at the event. Email JLNWA for more information on business packages. 

For tickets and info on attending the event, click HERE.
